author: Special Correspondent
text:
Applicants interested for the post of Gramin Dak Sevak mail carrier may send in their applications with self-attested copies of relevant certificates.

Application must be superscribed on the top of the cover as “Application for Gramin Dak Sevak Mail Carrier, Coimbatore HO” and addressed to “Shri. R. Ramalingam, Senior Postmaster, Coimbatore HO, Coimbatore- 641001”. Application should reach the office on or before March 11 by Registered Post or Speed Post only.

Business missions

A business mission is being organised by the Indo-Australian Chamber of Commerce for the Indian companies to establish business in Australia. The mission, with the focus on Tea and Agri business, will take place from April 8 to 17 and will be covering three cities- Brisbane, Melbourne and Sydney. Contact: 91-44-28361285/ 43849147 or email:admin@indoaustchamber.

com
title: Applications invited for Gramin Dak Sevak mail carrier
